placeholder.name: Name
placeholder.from_color: The color to start the effect from
placeholder.period: The time in seconds for one cyles of the effect
placeholder.cycles: The number of times to repeat the effect
placeholder.persist: If false set the light back to its previous value when effect ends
placeholder.power: The power state you want to set on the selector. on or off
placeholder.power_on: If true, turn the bulb on if it is not already on
placeholder.peak: Defines where in a period the target color is at its maximum. Minimum 0.0, maximum 1.0.
placeholder.brightness: The brightness level from 0.0 to 1.0. Overrides any brightness set in color (if any).
placeholder.duration: How long in seconds you want the power action to take.
placeholder.infrared: The maximum brightness of the infrared channel.
